attributes.action: Withdraw British troops from the wars in Iraq and Afghanistan immediately
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Let no more British blood be spilled in conflicts which have nothing to do with we the citizens of the UK. Our troops must be immediately brought home, and used in all future times in their correct role; the defence of British soil.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Withdraw British troops from the wars in Iraq and Afghanistan immediately."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11919.asp

Prime Minister's Office
